remarks.para: Creates a private LJCDataDetailDAL.DataDetailData object to provide simplified interaction with the database.

Calls DataDetailData.GetControlDetail() to create a private LJCDataDetailDAL.ControlDetail object to contain the dialog configuration retrieved from the database. A default configuration is created if a database configuration is not found.

ControlRow.summary: Creates the ControlRow and associated controls.
ControlRow.remarks: This method creates and positions the controls for a ControlRow. It creates a ControlRow definition and adds it to the private mControlRows collection.

SearchControls.summary: Returns a reference to a Control by name.

SearchLabel.summary: Returns a reference to a Label control by name.

SearchTextBox.summary: Return a reference to a TextBox control by name.

LJCDataColumns.summary: Gets a reference to the record object.
LJCDataColumns.remarks: This is the main data definition object. This data is used to populate the ControlColumns and ControlRows layout definition objects.

LJCKeyItems.summary: Gets or sets the ControlItems collection.
LJCKeyItems.remarks: Contains the StaticCombo, SelectList and StaticKey reference items.
